vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Gad living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.5.13;
son of: Abihail (H0032I);
brother of: Michael (H4317H), Meshullam (H4918I), Sheba (H7652), Jacan (H3275), Zia (H2127) and Eber (H5677H)
§ Jorai = "Jehovah has taught me"
one of the Gadites dwelling at Gilead in Bashan in the reign of king Jotham of Judah
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
約賴 这个陽性專有名詞在希伯來文的意思是 "耶華已指教我"
迦得支派的一名領袖 (代上 5:13)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
约赖 这个阳性专有名词在希伯来文的意思是 "耶华已指教我"
迦得支派的一名领袖 (代上 5:13)
